details.name: description
details.old_value:
The weapon icons that are displayed in the obituaries list (cg_graphicObituaries) and in the fireteam window are badly rendered in comparison with NQ.

It's possible that the icons themselves should be changed - NQ provides a complete new set of icons in the assets. As an example, the allies knife icon (K-Bar) is well rendered in legacy.
details.new_value:
The weapon icons that are displayed in the obituaries list (cg_graphicObituaries) and in the fireteam window are badly rendered in comparison with NQ.

It's possible that the icons themselves should be changed - NQ provides a complete new set of icons in the assets. As an example, the allies knife icon (K-Bar) is well rendered in legacy.

Some weapon icon size need to be corrected too (slienced pistols and silenced akimbo pistols).

subject: Badly rendered obituaries and fireteam weapon icons
description:
The weapon icons that are displayed in the obituaries list (cg_graphicObituaries) and in the fireteam window are badly rendered in comparison with NQ.

It's possible that the icons themselves should be changed - NQ provides a complete new set of icons in the assets. As an example, the allies knife icon (K-Bar) is well rendered in legacy.

Some weapon icon size need to be corrected too (slienced pistols and silenced akimbo pistols).
